org.lucidfox.jpromises.core

Interface Rejector


  • public interface Rejector

    A helper interface used when initializing a promise with a PromiseHandler, to allow the promise handler to reject the promise with an exception, indicating that an error occurred while evaluating the promise's value.

    This interface is not intended to be implemented by library users.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reject(java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Rejects the promise with the given rejection reason.

    • Method Detail

      • reject

        void reject(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Rejects the promise with the given rejection reason.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception (rejection reason)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the promise is already resolved or rejected
